page.title: 14TICKHILL LIONS CLUB
page.content: The Lions International was first started in America and has spread all over the world.The Lions raise money to help other{charities,}hospitals, playgroups etc.The Lions meet on a Tuesday night at the Millstone pub or at the Cricket{club.}It is well organised because if you are late for a meeting you have to pay 10p.In the Lions there is a president who is the leader.A vice president who takes over in a years time.A secrtery and a treasurer and there is a travelling Lion who vists other Lions.To collect money they organize lots of{events e.g a Father Christmas float and some stalls at the local Galas.Another local event is the St Leger half Marthon which passes through Tickhill.The Leos is a club linked with the Lions,and is for people aged between 15 and 25.
